评论详情: Product was delivered on time, the size and fit are perfect, and the fabric is soft and comfortable... What else could you want for some pajama pants? Pockets maybe? Well, These have that too!

My daughter LOVES these and literally pretty much lives in them. BUT...size up. The waist proportions compared to the leg width is a little off. She doesn't mind the slightly larger waste. She just rolls it. But she says they are very comfortable.
Not very stretchy. The image is misleading in that regard. They fit like jeans minus the zipper. Idk I'll wear them but not to bed

My daughter is in her comfy teen stage, so we ordered these last mini for “Pajama day” at school and thankfully they fit her the way she wanted and she loved them! The band is stretchy the rest is loose fitting, I’d size they are “big” but for these aren’t meant to be tight fitting. The quality seems good they washed nicely. Color was as seen on picture and she said they were super comfy!
Required a few washes before it started to feel more like lounge pants, but overall comfortable and roomy.

These Darong Teen/Women’s Plaid Lounge Pants are very thick yet comfortable and soft. They will be cozy to curl up in this winter to keep warm. They’re mainly advertised to teens but I think they look good on this grandma too!
Great color! Fabric is on the thick side. Good for winter

I ordered these in a size (M) for my 13 year old daughter, she is quite tall for her age 5'6.  ordered her a size She is totally obsessed with them! They're not a flannel feel on the outside, more of a rough cotton feel but more of a flannel material on the inside. She loves wearing them out, to school, or casually around the house. Definitely a must have for any teen!
Wow! Great material. Definitely thicker and heavier than I expected. This will be used during cold temperatures. Did wonderfully in the washer and dryer. Love it!

I ordered these for my 17-year-old daughter, and she absolutely loves them! The fabric is incredibly soft and comfortable, making them perfect for lounging around the house. The drawstring waist provides a relaxed fit, and the plaid print adds a cute, trendy touch. Great pair of lounge pants for cozy days! ~L

These pants are really good for winter or cooler weather. They are thicker and have some weight to them. Towards the bottom they are baggier/wide leg. The thigh area is a little tighter for my body type but the size is true to fit for what your standard lounge pants would be. Pattern was good, however, a little muted compared to what the picture shows.

评论概述: they are not what they appear to be
评论详情: Yes, they say on their ad, 'street-ware'.  Not sure if that is code for NOT SOFT.  NOT flannel.  Just be aware the material is 'sturdier' but the coloring which is what made me think this was of a softer material is deceiving if you are looking for something soft.They are heavier than flannel - therefore I guess more rugged. Just be aware this coloring pattern is NOT indicative of it being flannel material.
